Verses: 1 ejamaangale, Ungalukkum Paralogaththil Ejamaan Irukkiraarendru Arindhu, Velaikkaararukku Needhiyum Sevvaiyumaanadhai Seyyungal.
3 kiristhuvinudaiya Ragasiyaththinimiththam Kattappattirukkira Naan Andha Ragasiyaththaikkuriththup Pesavendiyapiragaaramaaip Pesi, Adhai Velippaduththuvadharku,
4 thiruvasanam Sellumpadiyaana Vaasalai Dhevan Thirandharulumpadi Engalukkaagavum Vendikkollungal.
5 purambeyirukkiravargalukku Munbaaga Gnaanamaai Nadandhu Kaalaththaip Pirayojanappaduththikkollungal.
6 avanavanukku Inninnapadi Uththaravu Sollavendumendru Neengal Ariyumpadikku, Ungal Vasanam Eppozhudhum Kirubai Porundhinadhaayum Uppaal Saaramerinadhaayumiruppadhaaga.
7 piriyamaana Sagodharanum, Unmaiyulla Oozhiyakkaaranum, Karththarukkul Enakku Udan Velaiyaalumaayirukkira Theekikku Enbavan En Seydhigalaiyellaam Ungalukku Arivippaan.
8 ungal Seydhigalai Ariyavum, Ungal Irudhayangalaith Thetravum,
9 avanaiyum, Ungaliloruvanaayirukkira Unmaiyum Piriyamumulla Sagodharanaagiya Onesimu Enbavanaiyum, Ungalidaththil Anuppiyirukkiren; Avargal Ivvidaththuch Seydhigalaiyellaam Ungalukku Arivippaargal.

10 ennodekoodak Kaavalilirukkira Arisdharkku Ungalukku Vaazhththudhal Sollugiraan; Parnabaavukku Inaththaanaagiya Maarkum Vaazhththudhal Sollugiraan, Ivanaikkuriththuk Kattalaipetreergale; Ivan Ungalidaththil Vandhaal Ivanai Angigariththukkollungal.

11 yusthu Ennappatta Yesuvum Vaazhththudhal Sollugiraan. Viruththasedhanamullavargalil Ivargal Maaththiram Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththinporuttu En Udanvelaiyaatkalaayirundhu, Enakku Aarudhal Seydhuvandhavargal.

12 eppaappiraavum Ungalukku Vaazhththudhal Sollugiraan; Ungalai Serndhavanum Kiristhuvin Oozhiyakkaaranumaagiya Ivan, Neengal Dhevanukku Siththamaanavaigalellaavatrilum Therinavargalaayum Poorana Nichchayamullavargalaayum Nilainirkavendumendru, Than Jebangalil Ungalukkaaga Eppozhudhum Poraadugiraan.
13 ivan Ungalukkaagavum, Lavodhikkeyarukkaagavum, Eraappoliyarukkaavum, Migundha Jaakkiradhaiyullavanaayirukkiraanenbadharku Naan Saatchiyaayirukkiren.
14 piriyamaana Vaiththiyanaagiya Lookkaavum, Themaavum, Ungalukku Vaazhththudhal Sollugiraargal.
15 lavodhikkeyaavilirukkira Sagodhararaiyum, Nimpaavaiyum, Avan Veettil Koodugira Sabaiyaiyum Vaazhththungal.
16 indha Nirubam Ungalidaththil Vaasikkappattapinbu Idhu Lavodhikkeyaa Sabaiyilum Vaasikkappadumpadi Seyyungal, Lavodhikkeyaavilirundhu Varum Nirubaththai Neengalum Vaasiyungal.
17 arkkippaik Kandu: Nee Karththaridaththil Petra Oozhiyaththai Niraivetrumpadi Gavanamaayiruppaayaagavendru Sollungal.
18 pavulaagiya Naan En Kaiyinaal Ezhudhi, Ungalai Vaazhththugiren. Naan Kattappattirukkiradhai Ninaiththukkollungal. Kirubai Ungalodiruppadhaaga. Aamen.
